about_the_game:
After surviving a shipwreck you find yourself on a deserted island. Having collected the necessary tools from improvised objects you start your way on this mysterious island. But will you be able to survive in this wild land? It won't be easy. These wild lands are filled with dangerous beasts that will defend their territories to the last. In the mines, valuable resources and terrible monsters are waiting for you. But remember, you are not the only one whose luck has turned away.....
Features:
Turn the beach into your stronghold! Build buildings for your mates in misery, grow food and catch fish.
Improve your skill with weapons and tools! Your allies can share their knowledge with you and help you become better, stronger and learn new techniques.
Explore a mysterious and wild island! Traveling around the island you will visit different locations where different resources and animals will be waiting for you.
Fight your way to the bottom of the mine! A mine awaits you in the depths of the island, with each descent into it changing the layout of the rooms. There are dangerous enemies waiting for you, but also valuable resources. Will you be brave enough to challenge them?
Upgrade your equipment! In your settlement you will meet craftsmen who will help you create different equipment and armor.
Meet the danger in full force! Fight your enemies using a comprehensive combat system and create your own personalized fighting style with a variety of weapons and a huge number of techniques.
Show the local fauna who are top of the food chain! Hunt different animals, individual to each location using different weapons and environments.
Create your own character! Thanks to the extensive editor, create your individual character.

content_descriptors.notes: The game has monsters that fight the player without showing any elements of cruelty or violence.
